name: attentiveness
content:
attentiveness noun [U]
(attention)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of paying attention and listening carefully: She brings a scholar’s attentiveness to detail to her job. The pianist was extraordinary, as you could see by the attentiveness of her audience.
More examplesFewer examplesThe class goes for a 15-minute walk every day, and the children’s attentiveness in class has improved as a result.The new X-ray system periodically tests the attentiveness of the people operating it.
